CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 29, 1955, pg. A17, reads: "AKA's Honor Anderson - The Greene Hearthe [sic] was the scene of a reception Saturday (photo above), night for Marian Anderson, honorary soror... - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Marian Anderson, Mary K. Ward, and Helen Howard, posed with Alpha Kappa Alpha ivy leaf shaped sign, in Greene Hearth
CatSubject_tab: Group portraits--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Women--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Alpha Kappa Alpha Sorority.Greene Hearth (Pittsburgh, Pa.)Greek letter societies--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Anderson, Marian, 1897-1993.
